description: This file defines a React functional component 'BulkUploader' that provides a user interface for uploading bulk resource or cost data via CSV/XLSX files. It includes functions for handling file parsing, validation, and submission to backend endpoints, along with error display and localStorage management. The component is highly customizable with props for parsing and posting data, and supports configuration for different upload kinds ('resources' or 'costs').

methods.name: acceptFor
methods.description: Generates accepted file types string based on upload kind ('resources' or 'costs').

methods.name: readFromLocalStorage
methods.description: Reads a string value from local storage with error handling.

methods.name: saveToLocalStorage
methods.description: Saves a string value to local storage or removes the key if value is empty.

methods.name: getFirstQueryParam
methods.description: Retrieves the first non-empty value for specified URL query parameters.

methods.name: ErrorList
methods.description: A React component that displays a list of row-level errors with accessibility features.
